product_name: Shebeest Breezer Board Shorts Bike Shorts - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Let's face it, not everyone is down with wearing spandex in public. The plus-size Shebeest Breezer board shorts provide the bike-riding comfort of a chamois in a more discreet board-short package. Removable bike-short liner has a chamois pad carefully developed to eliminate friction and chafing when you're in the saddle. Board shorts are made from a soft, quick-drying stretch nylon that you'll be happy to wear around town. Flat elastic waistband has an interior drawcord and a snap closure. Zippered back pocket on board shorts keeps cash and cards secure. Double loop system attaches liner shorts to outer Shebeest Breezer plus-size board shorts.
short_description: Let's face it, not everyone is down with wearing spandex in public. The plus-size Shebeest Breezer board shorts provide the bike-riding comfort of a chamois in a more discreet board-short package.
